channel.title: Dan Carlin's Hardcore History
channel.description: In "Hardcore History" journalist and broadcaster Dan Carlin takes his "Martian", unorthodox way of thinking and applies it to the past. Was Alexander the Great as bad a person as Adolf Hitler? What would Apaches with modern weapons be like? Will our modern civilization ever fall like civilizations from past eras? This isn't academic history (and Carlin isn't a historian) but the podcast's unique blend of high drama, masterful narration and Twilight Zone-style twists has entertained millions of listeners.
channel.itunes:summary: In "Hardcore History" journalist and broadcaster Dan Carlin takes his "Martian", unorthodox way of thinking and applies it to the past. Was Alexander the Great as bad a person as Adolf Hitler? What would Apaches with modern weapons be like? Will our modern civilization ever fall like civilizations from past eras? This isn't academic history (and Carlin isn't a historian) but the podcast's unique blend of high drama, masterful narration and Twilight Zone-style twists has entertained millions of listeners.

item.title: Show 18 - A Fly on James Burke's Wall
item.itunes:title: A Fly on James Burke's Wall
item.description: n this episode, Dan discusses history with famed television host, author and science historian James Burke, the man the Washington Post called “one of the most intriguing minds in the Western world”.
item.itunes:subtitle: n this episode, Dan discusses history with famed television host, author and science historian James Burke, the man the Washington Post called “one of the most intriguing minds in the Western world”.

item.title: Show 24 – Classical Hanson
item.itunes:title: Classical Hanson
item.description: Dan discusses history with famed historian, political commentator and classicist Victor Davis Hanson.

item.title: Show 25 – The Dyer Outlook
item.itunes:title: The Dyer Outlook
item.description: Dan discusses the past, present and future with influential Canadian historian, broadcaster and columnist Gwynne Dyer.
item.itunes:subtitle: Dan discusses the past, present and future with influential Canadian historian, broadcaster and columnist Gwynne Dyer.
